@11ty/eleventy: Transform a directory of templates into HTML.
arrify: Convert a value to an array
colorette: Easily set the color and style of text in the terminal.
cross-env: Run scripts that set and use environment variables across platforms
eslint: An AST-based pattern checker for JavaScript.
grapheme-splitter: A JavaScript library that breaks strings into their individual user-perceived characters. It supports emojis!
hyntax: Straightforward HTML parser for Node.js and browser
ietf-language-tag-regex: Regular expressions for matching IETF language tags (BCP 47)
leven: Measure the difference between two strings using the fastest JS implementation of the Levenshtein distance algorithm
line-column: Convert efficiently index to/from line-column in a string
lodash.ismatch: The lodash method `_.isMatch` exported as a module.
lodash.pullall: The lodash method `_.pullAll` exported as a module.
npm-check-updates: Find newer versions of dependencies than what your package.json allows
npm-run-all: A CLI tool to run multiple npm-scripts in parallel or sequential.
object-path: Access deep object properties using a path
str-indexes-of: Like String#indexOf() but return all indexes
typescript: TypeScript is a language for application scale JavaScript development
